meanings.definition: To move by jumping on one foot
meanings.sent1: The bunny was hopping around the garden.
meanings.sent2: She was hopping over the puddles on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo was hopping happily in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The basketball was hopping between players on the court.
meanings.sent5: The frog was hopping from one lily pad to another in the pond.

meanings.sent1: The kids were hopping with excitement at the carnival.
meanings.sent2: He was hopping from one task to another at work.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was hopping around the tree looking for nuts.
meanings.sent4: The idea was hopping around in his mind all day.
meanings.sent5: The music had everyone hopping on the dance floor.

meanings.definition: To make a short, bouncing movement
meanings.sent1: The ball was hopping down the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The popcorn was hopping in the microwave.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit was hopping around the garden, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: The idea was hopping from one person to another in the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops were hopping on the roof during the storm.
